actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-921.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2934) to amend the Public Health Service Act to extend through fiscal year 1985 the health planning authority under that Act and to repeal that authority September 30, 1986, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2934 (health planning services).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2934) to amend the Public Health Service Act to extend through fiscal year 1985 the health planning authority under that Act and to repeal that authority September 30, 1986, and for other purposes.
